article.title: Norton Assigned to U.S. Naval Forces Europe/Africa/Sixth Fleet
article.author: Henry Kenyon

tags.tag: U.S. Naval Forces Europe/U.S. Naval Forces Africa/Sixth Fleet

article.text: Capt. Kenneth J. Norton, USN, has been selected for promotion to rear admiral and assignment as deputy chief of staff for strategy, resources and plans, N-5/N-8, U.S. Naval Forces Europe/U.S. Naval Forces Africa/Sixth Fleet, Naples, Italy.
